titles: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for every second Tuesday in the moneth to be a day of recreation for schollers, apprentices, and servants
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed at London for John Wright ...,
notes: At head of title: Die Veneris II Iunii 1647.
"Die Veneris II Junii 1647. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
